sentence.text: We aimed to investigate the effect of the AS to negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene on non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) development.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The expression level of lncRNA FEZF-AS1 and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II was determined by the quantitative Real-time PCR in 160 cases of NSCLC tissues and their adjacent non-tumour tissues.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: By GEPIA database analysis, we also found that the expression of lncRNA FEZF-AS1 and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II were significantly higher in tumour tissues than those of the adjacent non-cancerous tissues in 969 NSCLC patients (P AAAA 0.05), and lncRNA FEZF-AS1 was positively correlated with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II (r = 0.90, P AAAA 0.001).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
